content: danish heart crochet pattern suggested yarn and crochet hook size fingering weight + size c/2 2 75mm hook dk weight + size f/5 3 75mm hook worsted weight + size h/6 5 00mm hook gauge is not important for this project just make sure that your crochet is nice and tight adjust crochet hook size smaller if necessary us crochet terms beg beginning chain s chain s single_crochet single_crochet st stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch make 2 ovals one in red one in cream chain 30 round 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet in the next 27 chain 3 single_crochet in the last chain crocheting along the opposite side of the foundation chain single_crochet in the next 28 chain 3 single_crochet in the skipped chain from the beg slip_stitch in beg single_crochet round 2 chain 1
